section.title: &product;
section.para: &product; is a highly scalable, high performance open-source operating system designed to utilize the power of parallel computing for modeling, simulation and advanced analytics workloads.
&product; &this-version; provides tools and libraries related to High Performance Computing. This includes:

listitem.para: A tool for discovering the machine hardware topology
A tool for monitoring memory errors
A tool for determining the CPU model and its capabilities (x86-64 only)
User-extensible heap manager capable of distinguishing between different kinds of memory (x86-64 only)
Serial and parallel computational libraries providing the common standards BLAS, LAPACK, ...
Serial and parallel libraries for the HDF5 file format

section.title: Hardware Platform Support
section.para: &product; &this-version; is available for the &x86-64; (x86-64) and &arm64; platforms.

section.title: Support and Life Cycle
section.para: &product; is backed by award-winning support from &suse;, an established technology leader with a proven history of delivering enterprise-quality support services.

&product; &this-ga; has a 13-year life cycle, with 10 years of General Support and 3 years of Extended Support. The current version (&this-sp;) will be fully maintained and supported until 6 months after the release of &product; &this-ga; &next-sp;.
Any release package is fully maintained and supported until the availability of the next release.

If you need additional time to design, validate and test your upgrade plans, Long Term Service Pack Support (LTSS) can extend the support you get by an additional 12 to 36 months in 12-month increments, providing a total of 3 to 5 years of support on any given Service Pack.
